name: Mansi Uniyal

experience.title: Research Fellow
experience.description: Multi turn for Excel:‚Ä¢ As part of PROSE team, leveraged LLMs, for generating & validating conversational benchmarks for Excel-Copilot evaluationFormula Suggestions:‚Ä¢ Demoed & built Suggestion & Ranking system for automated formula-value completions, on new calculated columns in Excel tablesCode generation benchmarking and evaluation:‚Ä¢ Improved bench-marking (under & over-specified MBPP versions) dataset & evaluation setup for code generation (EMNLP, 2024)Auto checklist:‚Ä¢ Leveraged LLMs for automating checklist generation for subjective evaluation on, ambiguity - InstructExcel, quality - Translation
experience.description_html: Multi turn for Excel:‚Ä¢ As part of PROSE team, leveraged LLMs, for generating & validating conversational benchmarks for Excel-Copilot evaluationFormula Suggestions:‚Ä¢ Demoed & built Suggestion & Ranking system for automated formula-value completions, on new calculated columns in Excel tablesCode generation benchmarking and evaluation:‚Ä¢ Improved bench-marking (under & over-specified MBPP versions) dataset & evaluation setup for code generation (EMNLP, 2024)Auto checklist:‚Ä¢ Leveraged LLMs for automating checklist generation for subjective evaluation on, ambiguity - InstructExcel, quality - Translation

experience.title: Data Science Intern
experience.description: ‚Ä¢ Build AutoML for Text Classification component: data profiling, preprocessing, embedding, model pipeline, and evaluation‚Ä¢ Explored Open-AI toolkit, DALL-E model, for Text2Image generation, and its HuggingFace open-sourced variations with fine-tuning‚Ä¢ Surveyed Active Learning, implemented Weak Supervision using Rubrix, & built weak labeling component for text classification‚Ä¢ Dived deeper into exploring methods for cleaner labels from these noisy weak labels and finding label errors using the CleanLab library‚Ä¢ Inferred the generation of Text2Motion, and built a pipeline for creating videos from a pre-trained model using user-defined text
experience.description_html: ‚Ä¢ Build AutoML for Text Classification component: data profiling, preprocessing, embedding, model pipeline, and evaluation‚Ä¢ Explored Open-AI toolkit, DALL-E model, for Text2Image generation, and its HuggingFace open-sourced variations with fine-tuning‚Ä¢ Surveyed Active Learning, implemented Weak Supervision using Rubrix, & built weak labeling component for text classification‚Ä¢ Dived deeper into exploring methods for cleaner labels from these noisy weak labels and finding label errors using the CleanLab library‚Ä¢ Inferred the generation of Text2Motion, and built a pipeline for creating videos from a pre-trained model using user-defined text

experience.title: Machine Learning Engineer
experience.description: ‚Ä¢ 3D Medical Image Segmentation: Lung Cancer Detection using 3D Convolutional model architecture‚Ä¢ Head Gesture Recognition: Worked on classification for head gestures using video signals based on different degrees of freedom‚Ä¢ Neural Style Transfer: Demonstrated enhancement of results on SimpleNet by data augmentation techniques using CycleGAN model‚Ä¢ Art generator with GANs: Designed adversarial models: DC-GAN, WGAN and CGANs, with evaluation using FID metrics‚Ä¢ Object Detection: Visualized, analyzed, structured, and preprocessed the data, and implemented Transfer learning on the YOLO model‚Ä¢ Aircraft optimization: Developed a heuristic solution approach for a weekly schedule with minimized maintenance cost using DFS
experience.description_html: ‚Ä¢ 3D Medical Image Segmentation: Lung Cancer Detection using 3D Convolutional model architecture‚Ä¢ Head Gesture Recognition: Worked on classification for head gestures using video signals based on different degrees of freedom‚Ä¢ Neural Style Transfer: Demonstrated enhancement of results on SimpleNet by data augmentation techniques using CycleGAN model‚Ä¢ Art generator with GANs: Designed adversarial models: DC-GAN, WGAN and CGANs, with evaluation using FID metrics‚Ä¢ Object Detection: Visualized, analyzed, structured, and preprocessed the data, and implemented Transfer learning on the YOLO model‚Ä¢ Aircraft optimization: Developed a heuristic solution approach for a weekly schedule with minimized maintenance cost using DFS

experience.title: AI Intern
experience.description: ‚Ä¢ Deployed an Intelligent Recruitment System using NLP (Natural Language Processing) to extract best-fit applicants from their resumes‚Ä¢ Extracted information from various file formats (like doc, pdf) of resumes using Non-OCR Techniques followed by data structuring‚Ä¢ Customized NER (Named Entity Recognition) for organizations & names and built a query-based sorting of resumes based on skill set‚Ä¢ Developed a query-based sorting system to analyze categories of relevant Resumes with respect to various keywords/similarity database
experience.description_html: ‚Ä¢ Deployed an Intelligent Recruitment System using NLP (Natural Language Processing) to extract best-fit applicants from their resumes‚Ä¢ Extracted information from various file formats (like doc, pdf) of resumes using Non-OCR Techniques followed by data structuring‚Ä¢ Customized NER (Named Entity Recognition) for organizations & names and built a query-based sorting of resumes based on skill set‚Ä¢ Developed a query-based sorting system to analyze categories of relevant Resumes with respect to various keywords/similarity database

          ‚Ä¢ Entrusted with the responsibility of increasing the global outreach of IIT Kharagpur in coordination with the Office of International Relations as a part of a 20-member team‚Ä¢ Garnered 151 (47% YoY increase) Foreign Training offers with projects from leading universities like TUM, Imperial College London, Lehigh university‚Ä¢ Organized first offline event, post-pandemic, On-Campus round of Hult Prize which participation of 35+ teams from UG and PG students‚Ä¢ Collaborated with OIR to organize the online edition of JDP Open House which witnessed the participation of 200+ Ph.D. students.‚Ä¢ Organized a panel discussion in hybrid mode, with the Committee members of New Curriculum, which included Dean‚Äôs and Associate Dean of Academics, which saw a participation of 750+ students.‚Ä¢ Coordinated with ETS to avail a special discount voucher scheme for IIT Kharagpur students for GRE/TOEFL preparation courses

projects: [{"title":"Molecule Generation using Contrastive VAE","start_date":"Apr 2022","end_date":"Jul 2022","description":"‚Ä¢ Under the guidance of Prof. Douglas Kell, Research Chair in Systems Biology, Biochemistry & Systems Biology, University of Liverpool ‚Ä¢ Literary survey on the existing techniques on molecular generation: Transformers, VAE, MassGenie, Contrastive learning, Moses‚Ä¢ Experimented on VAE model with contrastive learning for robust and faster performance, with an accuracy of 93% on generation"},{"title":"Server-Side Local Gradient Averaging and Learning Rate Acceleration for Scalable Split Learning","start_date":"Apr 2021","end_date":"Nov 2021","description":"Presented at AAAI 2022‚Ä¢ Proposed a variation of SpliFed Learning for enhancement of the performance of image classification on FMNIST and CIFAR-10‚Ä¢ Worked on privacy, communication efficiency, and client-server training imbalance problem along with the scalability of the performance"},{"title":"Eye movement type categorization","start_date":"Oct 2020","end_date":"Jan 2021","description":"‚Ä¢ Under the guidance of Prof. Jhareswar Maiti, Professor at the Department of Industrial and Systems Engineering, IIT Kharagpur‚Ä¢ Literary surveyed on EEG signals, GWO algorithm, Eye movement types‚Ä¢ Worked on sequential time series data of the eye, predicting the categories of fixation points‚Ä¢ Successfully implemented and proposed Deep BLSTM-LSTM model architecture"},{"title":"GAN algorithms in generation of Super-Resolution from High-Resolution satellite images","start_date":"Oct 2020","end_date":"Dec 2020","description":"‚Ä¢ Under the guidance of Dr. Bharath H.Aithal, Ass. Professor at Ranbir & Chitra Gupta School of Infrastructure Design and Management, IIT Kharagpur‚Ä¢ Implemented SRCNN, and Bicubic Interpolation as baseline models for the task of image super-resolution‚Ä¢ Replicated EEGAN(Edge Enhancement Generative Adversarial Network) with implementation on HPC (High-Performance Computing)"},{"title":"Deep learning based architectures for semantic segmentation of aerial imagery","start_date":"Sep 2020","end_date":"Dec 2020","description":"Presented at International Conference on Unmanned Aerial Systems in Geomatics 2021‚Ä¢ Built a CNN-based, Modified UNet model with Transfer Learning for satellite imagery on a wide range of Geospatial domains worldwide‚Ä¢ Analysed results over other models: ResNet, VGGNet, SegNet, UNet and worked on including morphological methods: Erosion, Dilation"}]
